actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To improve health care choice by providing for the tax deductibility of medical expenses by individuals.
short_title: Health Care Freedom of Choice Act

summary.text: Health Care Freedom of Choice Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow as a deduction expenses paid, not compensated for by insurance or otherwise, for medical care.

titles.title: Health Care Freedom of Choice Act
To improve health care choice by providing for the tax deductibility of medical expenses by individuals.
